name: id Tech 4 Model Camera File
summary: Learn about .MD5CAMERA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MD5CAMERA files are stored in a plain text format. They are often packaged into id Tech 4 packages, which use the .PK4 extension.
NOTE: id Tech 4 is also known as the "Doom 3 engine."

description: 3D camera file used by id Tech 4, a game engine developed by id Software for Doom 3 and Quake 4; contains 3D camera paths, including the position, rotation, and field of view for each path; used for controlling cameras during cinematic sequences and cut scenes in id Tech 4 games.
